Guidelines for the Formulation
Recommendations
1. Express one topic or idea per sentence.
Falls are types of incidents, which can happen in hospitals.
Falls are types of incidents Falls happen in hospitals
Falls are types of incidents. Falls happen in hospitals.
2. Include in each sentence subject, verb and object (SVO)
(Do not use pronouns instead of nouns!)
(Do not use pronouns instead of nouns!)
They receive assistance.
Patients receive assistance.
3. Avoid using neither interrogative nor negative 
sentences.
Chairs are not considered mobility aids.
Mobility aids are walking sticks, walking frames, crutches, wheelchairs, 
walking tripods, callipers, orthotics, and prosthetic devices.
